Mr. SMUCKER. Mr. Speaker, I am pleased to congratulate Adam Kingston  of Manheim Township on winning a gold medal in the Class 3A 3,200-meter  run at the PIAA track and field championship on May 24.

The 2025 PIAA Class 3A track and field championship saw students from  across Pennsylvania's 11th Congressional District…

…Congressional District. Ariannah Floyd, a senior at  Firelands High School, has represented her school ably on her way to  achieving the Division II State Title for the 300 Meter Hurdles at the  State Track and Field Meet. Ariannah overcame the challenges posed by  intense competition in her effort to win the title.
